013package org.apache.juneau;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.collections.JsonMap.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.StringUtils.*;
017import static java.util.Collections.*;
018
019import java.text.*;
020import java.util.*;
021import java.util.function.*;
022
023import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
026
027/**
028 * A one-time-use non-thread-safe object that's meant to be used once and then thrown away.
029 *
030 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
031 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not typically thread safe.
032 * </ul>
033 *
034 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
035 * </ul>
036 */
037public abstract class ContextSession {
038
039   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
040   // Builder
041   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
042
043   /**
044    * Builder class.
045    */
046   @FluentSetters
047   public static abstract class Builder {
048      Context ctx;
049      JsonMap properties;
050      boolean unmodifiable;
051      Boolean debug;
052
053      /**
054       * Constructor.
055       *
056       * @param ctx The context creating this session.
057       */
058      protected Builder(Context ctx) {
059         this.ctx = ctx;
060         debug = ctx.debug;
061      }
062
063      /**
064       * Build the object.
065       *
066       * @return The built object.
067       */
068      public abstract ContextSession build();
069
070      /**
071       * Debug mode.
072       *
073       * <p>
074       * Enables the following additional information during parsing:
075       * <ul>
076       *    <li> When bean setters throws exceptions, the exception includes the object stack information in order to determine how that method was invoked.
077       * </ul>
078       *
079       * <p>
080       * If not specified, defaults to {@link Context.Builder#debug()}.
081       *
082       * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
083       *    <li class='ja'>{@link org.apache.juneau.annotation.BeanConfig#debug()}
084       *    <li class='jm'>{@link org.apache.juneau.Context.Builder#debug()}
085       *
086       * @param value
087       *    The new value for this property.
088       *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.  Value will be ignored.
089       * @return This object.
090       */
091      @FluentSetter
092      public Builder debug(Boolean value) {
093         if (value != null)
094            debug = value;
095         return this;
096      }
097
098      /**
099       * Create an unmodifiable session.
100       *
101       * <p>
102       * The created ContextSession object will be unmodifiable which makes it suitable for caching and reuse.
103       *
104       * @return This object.
105       */
106      @FluentSetter
107      public Builder unmodifiable() {
108         unmodifiable = true;
109         return this;
110      }
111
112      /**
113       * Session properties.
114       *
115       * <p>
116       * Session properties are generic key-value pairs that can be passed through the session and made
117       * available to any customized serializers/parsers or swaps.
118       *
119       * @param value
120       *    The new value for this property.
121       *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
122       * @return This object.
123       */
124      @FluentSetter
125      public Builder properties(Map<String,Object> value) {
126         properties = JsonMap.of(value);
127         return this;
128      }
129
130      /**
131       * Adds a property to this session.
132       *
133       * @param key The property key.
134       * @param value The property value.
135       * @return This object.
136       */
137      @FluentSetter
138      public Builder property(String key, Object value) {
139         if (properties == null)
140            properties = JsonMap.create();
141         if (value == null) {
142            properties.remove(key);
143         } else {
144            properties.put(key, value);
145         }
146         return this;
147      }
148
149      /**
150       * Applies a consumer to this builder if it's the specified type.
151       *
152       * @param <T> The expected type.
153       * @param type The expected type.
154       * @param apply   The consumer to apply.
155       * @return This object.
156       */
157      @FluentSetter
158      public <T> Builder apply(Class<T> type, Consumer<T> apply) {
159         if (type.isInstance(this))
160            apply.accept(type.cast(this));
161         return this;
162      }
163
164      // <FluentSetters>
165
166      // </FluentSetters>
167   }
168
169   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
170   // Instance
171   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
172
173   private final JsonMap properties;
174   private List<String> warnings;   // Any warnings encountered.
175
176   private final Context ctx;
177   private final boolean debug;
178   private final boolean unmodifiable;
179
180   /**
181    * Default constructor.
182    *
183    * @param builder The builder for this object
184    */
185   protected ContextSession(Builder builder) {
186      ctx = builder.ctx;
187      unmodifiable = builder.unmodifiable;
188      JsonMap sp = builder.properties == null ? JsonMap.EMPTY_MAP : builder.properties;
189      if (unmodifiable)
190         sp = sp.unmodifiable();
191      properties = sp;
192      debug = builder.debug;
193   }
194
195   /**
196    * Returns the session properties on this session.
197    *
198    * @return The session properties on this session.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
199    */
200   public final JsonMap getSessionProperties() {
201      return properties;
202   }
203
204   /**
205    * Returns the context that created this session.
206    *
207    * @return The context that created this session.
208    */
209   public Context getContext() {
210      return ctx;
211   }
212
213   /**
214    * Logs a warning message.
215    *
216    * @param msg The warning message.
217    * @param args Optional {@link MessageFormat}-style arguments.
218    */
219   public void addWarning(String msg, Object... args) {
220      if (unmodifiable)
221         return;
222      if (warnings == null)
223         warnings = new LinkedList<>();
224      warnings.add((warnings.size() + 1) + ": " + format(msg, args));
225   }
226
227   /**
228    * Returns the warnings that occurred in this session.
229    *
230    * @return The warnings that occurred in this session, or <jk>null</jk> if no warnings occurred.
231    */
232   public final List<String> getWarnings() {
233      return warnings == null ? emptyList() : warnings;
234   }
235
236   /**
237    * Throws a {@link BeanRuntimeException} if any warnings occurred in this session and debug is enabled.
238    */
239   public void checkForWarnings() {
240      if (debug && ! getWarnings().isEmpty())
241         throw new BeanRuntimeException("Warnings occurred in session: \n" + Utils.join(getWarnings(), "\n"));
242   }
243
244   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
245   // Configuration properties
246   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
247
248   /**
249    * Debug mode enabled.
250    *
251    * @see Context.Builder#debug()
252    * @return
253    *    <jk>true</jk> if debug mode is enabled.
254    */
255   public boolean isDebug() {
256      return debug;
257   }
258
259   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
260   // Other methods
261   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
262
263   /**
264    * Returns the properties on this bean as a map for debugging.
265    *
266    * @return The properties on this bean as a map for debugging.
267    */
268   protected JsonMap properties() {
269      return filteredMap("debug", debug);
270   }
271
272   @Override /* Object */
273   public String toString() {
274      return Utils2.toPropertyMap(this).asReadableString();
275   }
276}
